item.description:
The meetup event is for the Shanghai Night asian party organized by the Boston Professional Organization and Chinese Young Professional Networking groups. Party starts at 10pm, but we will have dinner at Montien (Thai restaurant) at 8:00 PM prior to heading to the Party. 

This RSVP is for the Party and Dinner, if you are only going to one or the other, please indicate this on your RSVP. If you're not coming to dinner, you can meet us at the door at Caprice Lounge. 

Montien's location: 

63 Stuart Street
Boston, MA 02116-4723
(617) 338-5600

 

Ticket information is below ($15). It is recommended to purchase tickets before it is sold out. The price at the door is $20 if tix are available. The organiers of this party do recommend to buy online asap. There is no guarantee that tickets will be available at the door.

BPO & CYPN Asian Party--Shanghai Night

When: April 29th (Friday), 10PM – 2AM
Where: Caprice Lounge Boston
275 Tremont Street, Boston, MA 02116-5615

American TOP 40 and Asian hip-pop mixes to bring you an unforgettable Shanghai experience right here in Boston. Dance to Jay Chow, Leehom Wang, A-mei, Jolin Tsai, Wonder Girls, Super Junior and

 

many more mixed by the young dynamic duo DJ Kevin Luu & DJ Aries Dèng.
Early bird prizes include Cruise tickets, AMC Gold Movie Tickets and many more. Raffle is only for those who manage to grab tickets before the price increase. 150 tickets will be sold at $15 and prices will increase thereafter.
 
So what are you waiting for? Invite your friends and party with us! 
Tickets run out fast and are not guaranteed at the door, please purchase tickets early at www.1bpo.org

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: Shanghai's Night- Asian Party - Caprice Lounge - April 29th (10:00 PM - 2:00 AM)
